name: CardFinder
0:
”Alexa Ask Card Finder to find my card”
”Alexa Ask Card Finder find the second card”
”Alexa Ask Card Finder the first card is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: card finder
des:
In this simple magic trick, the magician has a spectator select a card. The magician says "Alexa Ask Card Finder, What is the card?" 

Alexa responses with the selected card. 
A second card can also be selected and the Alexa will reveal the second card.

Please note you'll in order to use this skill you'll need to know some basic card sleight of hand.
You can learn how to perform this trick step by step with the Card Finder ebook:

https://www.amazon.com/Card-Finder-Amazon-Alexa-Magic-ebook/dp/B075748RL7/

Additional phrases include:
Alexa Ask Card Finder to find my card
Alexa Ask Card Finder what is the card
Alexa Ask Card Finder reveal the card

Alexa Ask Card Finder reveal <<person name>> card
Alexa Ask Card Finder find the first card
Alexa Ask Card Finder find the second card

Alexa Ask Card Finder The first card is
Alexa Ask Card Finder The second card is
Alexa Ask Card Finder The third card is
Alexa Ask Card Finder Name the first selection
Alexa Ask Card Finder Name the second selection
Alexa Ask Card Finder Name the third selection
Alexa Ask Card Finder What is the first card
Alexa Ask Card Finder What is the second card
Alexa Ask Card Finder What is the third card
Alexa Ask Card Finder find the first card
Alexa Ask Card Finder find the second card

Note: The first revelation will be the Ace of Spades 2nd revelation will be the 3 of Hearts

Got Questions? Email them to andy@andymakar.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
